channel.title: Castle wars problem,
channel.description:
i got a castle wars problem...
how can i make that if you wear the same cape you cant attk each other?

item.title: Castle wars problem,
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

public void teamCape() { if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4516 && AttackingOn2.playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4516) { sendMessage("You can't attack your own team."); ResetAttack(); return false; } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4514 && AttackingOn2.playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4514) { sendMessage("You can't attack your own team."); ResetAttack(); return false; } }

Read full topic

item.title: Castle wars problem,
item.dc:creator: @C4ll3r C4ll3r
item.description:
@C4ll3r wrote:

Thx for code but that code dont work and i made from that this :l

[code]public void teamCape() {
if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4516) &&

(AttackingOn2.playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4516); {
sendMessage(“You can’t attack your own team.”);
ResetAttack();
return false;
}
if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4514) &&

(AttackingOn2.playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4514); {
sendMessage(“You can’t attack your own team.”);
ResetAttack();
return false;
}
}[/code]
But i get this error:

client.java:1096: illegal start of expression if ("playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4516") && (AttackingOn2.playerEquipment[pla erCape] == 4516); { ^ client.java:1101: illegal start of expression if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4514) && (AttackingOn2.playerEquipment[playe Cape] == 4514); { ^ 2 errors Compiling Finished. Druk op een toets om door te gaan. . .

Read full topic
